title: How should I prepare for international olympiad of mathematics? - Quora

response.answer_text: Begin by going through the syllabus. Sort out your strong and weak points. Work on them accordingly. If you feel you’re prepared enough, attempt previous year questions from books by Silver Zone Foundation. If you can attempt most of them, then you’re done. Remember to engage in effective time management while going through the syllabus. If you’re looking to acquire this book (or others) for free, you may check out this website called MyPustak. You just have to pay shipping charges. I wish you all the best for your preparation.
